channel.title: Computer Question :)
channel.description:
Hey MoparScape, does anyone here know how to [b]Permanetly[/b] install a File, Program, or Folder on a Computer?
If so, can anyone please tell me? Thank-you.
The reason i'm asking this is because the Computer i'm using don't save downloaded files off the Internet when you restart the Computer. It'll stay when you download them, but once you restart the Computer there gone.

item.title: Computer Question :)
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Your computer needs to be able to save SOME programs, so find how it saves those SOME files and add your file there. (My library computer’s are like this)

Read full topic
